channel.title: Scripting auf Nicky Reinert
channel.description: Blog & projects by Nicky Reinert (Institute for Digital Challenges): web development & software development, SEO & analytics, hosting & DevOps, WordPress & Hugo, tools & projects, data protection & digital culture — plus content on AI and autism & society.

item.title: Advent of Code - Day 5 - Printer Updates (Bash)
item.description: (task | solution) It’s the fifth day of our outrageous adventure, and we are dealing with printer updates. To solve this riddle, we are getting back to the roots and our good ol’ friend Bash! The good news here is that I don’t need to set up any particular environment because, thankfully, Bash is …
